title: Riot needs to improve team
body: There needs to be a team composition of those that spend money and those that dont,the trolls as a majority are those that do not spend money to improve and keep this game up and going. I have spent over $1000 and get team with feeders and trollers that do this on purpose. It really needs to be fixed for this companies money spenders. As they saying goes "we want our moneys worth"

replies.body: this has to be the dumbest thing i have heard this week.....

Actually kinda makes sense tbh.

Spend $10 on rp unlock a queue that locks out a vast majority of the trolls? im down.

Even better make the minimum requirement something like $100 spent on the account and people will be shitting themselves too much to troll for fear of losing their accounts.

Imagine, a ranked free of all the bullshit.

Everyone has some dank ass skins.

and we are all tryharding because we dont want to be reported.

No this makes no sense at all.

League is an FTP game and any real money transactions made do not impact how well a person plays. You pay for aesthetics and that's all really. If doesn't matter if you spend $1000 or $0, the game is all about skill. By making queues purchasable is annihilating Riots FTP policy. This post is made by someone who is butthurt and doesn't understand how Riots model for League works

the point went completely over your head.

Take joe blow troll here, he hit 30 in 2 weeks never spends a dime on his account and literally only plays the game to go smiteless ad janna jg and scream memes in all chat in ranked.

Joe blow troll will never spend any money on his account because he knows he will get banned eventually.

By implementing a queue with a paywall joe blow will be removed from that queue by default, because as much as he likes trolling he wont enjoy spending $50 every few weeks every time he has to make a new account.

The actual skill level of the queue will not be any greater, just the fact that there will be less dickwads in it.

Basically its a workaround to create troll island while simultaneously motivating well meaning players to support the game to get access to the less toxic queue.

Like i dunno about you but id sure as hell spend $50 as a one off to get less trolls in my solo queue.
Guess the trolls have come out to comment, if you seem to be hurt by this......guess it affects you trollzors.
